57997.<start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「い: <start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>What in the world was that?!<stop_lip_animation n02004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57999.<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「ご: <start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>A good day to you all of Melsandy Village.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58000.<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「…:

58001.<start_lip_sync n02004 _normal m00001>「て:

58004.<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「キ:

58005.<start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「お: <start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>I'm not afraid of you!<stop_lip_animation n02002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58006.<start_lip_sync n02002 _normal m00001>「オ:

58009.<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「み:

58011.<start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>「魔: <start_lip_sync n02006 _normal m00001>Long live... Our master...<stop_lip_animation n02006 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58015.<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「キ:

58016.<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「メ: <start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Melsandy has no need for heroes... <heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58017.<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「よ: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>Hey, <pc>... Is it really you?<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58018.<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「ハ:

58019.<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「メ:

58028.<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「俺:

58029.<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「だ:

58032.<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「気:

58033.<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「そ:

58035.<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「…:

58036.<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「そ:

58037.<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「娘:
